20110113040802.000|20110113040806.000|CC1|SENATOR MARK UDALL SENT A LETTER
20110113040806.000|20110113040808.000|CC1|ASKING THEM TO END THE TRADITION
20110113040808.000|20110113040811.000|CC1|OF SITTING IN TACT AND WITH     
20110113040811.000|20110113040812.000|CC1|THEIR OWN POLITICAL PARTIES.    
20110113040812.000|20110113040813.000|CC1|WHAT AMERICANS SEE WHEN THEY    
20110113040813.000|20110113040815.000|CC1|WATCH IT ON TV IS A CONGRESS    
20110113040815.000|20110113040820.000|CC1|THAT IS BITTERLY DIVIDED BY     
20110113040820.000|20110113040820.000|CC1|PARTY.                          
20110113040820.000|20110113040823.000|CC1|THAT VERY PROPOSAL HAD BEEN     
20110113040823.000|20110113040826.000|CC1|OFFERED BY THIRD WAY, OF WHICH  
20110113040826.000|20110113040829.000|CC1|CONGRESSMAN GIFFORDS HAS BEEN AN
20110113040829.000|20110113040831.000|CC1|HONORARY CO CHAIR.              
20110113040831.000|20110113040836.000|CC1|NOW JOINING US AS PROMISED, THE 
20110113040836.000|20110113040838.000|CC1|GENTLEMAN WHO ACTED TO HELP SAVE
20110113040838.000|20110113040842.000|CC1|HER LIFE, DANIEL HERNANDEZ, JR. 
20110113040842.000|20110113040844.000|CC1|GREAT THANKS FOR YOUR TIME      
20110113040844.000|20110113040844.000|CC1|TONIGHT, SIR.                   
20110113040844.000|20110113040845.000|CC1|>> THANKS FOR HAVING ME.        
20110113040845.000|20110113040847.000|CC1|>> WHAT DID YOU THINK OF        
20110113040847.000|20110113040847.000|CC1|TONIGHT'S SERVICE?              
20110113040847.000|20110113040850.000|CC1|>> I THINK IT WAS A GOOD STEP   
20110113040850.000|20110113040853.000|CC1|FORWARD NOT ONLY FOR THOSE OF US
20110113040853.000|20110113040855.000|CC1|IN TUCSON AND ARIZONA, BUT FOR  
20110113040855.000|20110113040856.000|CC1|THE ENTIRE COUNTRY.             
20110113040856.000|20110113040900.000|CC1|WHAT HAPPENED ON SATURDAY IS A  
20110113040900.000|20110113040901.000|CC1|TRAGEDY FOR THE COUNTRY.        
20110113040901.000|20110113040903.000|CC1|>> WHEN YOU THINK ABOUT WHAT    
20110113040903.000|20110113040905.000|CC1|CONGRESSWOMAN GIFFORDS IS GOING 
20110113040905.000|20110113040905.000|CC1|THROUGH AND WHAT YOU WITNESSED

20110113040912.000|20110113040913.000|CC1|TRAGEDY THAT HAS SEEMED TO HAVE 
20110113040913.000|20110113040915.000|CC1|BEEN SO LONG THAT IS NOW JUST

20110113045153.000|20110113045155.000|CC1|   AN IRREGULAR HEARTBEAT,
